fields.name: Delivery Class
fields.description: Portfolio classification for reporting and release discipline.

fields.name: Work Type
fields.description: Human vs agent execution pattern.

fields.name: Automation Eligibility
fields.description: How far automation may go without human intervention.

fields.name: WIP Risk
fields.description: Execution risk used in prioritization and SLA views.

fields.name: Execution Confidence
fields.description: 0-100 confidence score (automation derived; manual override forbidden).

fields.name: Planned Start
fields.description: Plan date (optional; typically set for active initiatives).

fields.name: Planned Finish
fields.description: Plan date (optional; typically set for active initiatives).

fields.name: Actual Start
fields.description: First time work entered In Progress or equivalent.

fields.name: Actual Finish
fields.description: Completion date when item enters Done/Closed.

fields.name: Blocked Reason
fields.description: Primary blocker category for flow optimization.

fields.name: Blocked Detail
fields.description: Short free-text detail for current blocker (optional).

fields.name: Upstream Dependency Count
fields.description: Count of prerequisites; derived from linked issues/PRs and explicit refs.

fields.name: Downstream Impact Count
fields.description: Count of dependents/consumers; derived.

fields.name: Governance Gate
fields.description: Which gate is in force for this work item.

fields.name: Gate Status
fields.description: Current state of the governing gate.

fields.name: Policy Version
fields.description: Governance policy version (e.g., gov-2026-01).

fields.name: Evidence Required
fields.description: Whether evidence is required for this item under current gate.

fields.name: Evidence Complete
fields.description: Whether required evidence is present and validated.

fields.name: Evidence Bundle ID
fields.description: Content-addressed bundle identifier (hash/slug) if produced.

fields.name: Audit Criticality
fields.description: Audit materiality classification.

fields.name: External Audit Scope
fields.description: Whether this work item is in external audit scope.

fields.name: Control Mapping
fields.description: Control frameworks impacted/covered by this work item.

fields.name: CI Status Snapshot
fields.description: Current CI health signal from required checks.

fields.name: Determinism Risk
fields.description: Risk assessment of nondeterminism introduced/observed.

fields.name: Test Coverage Delta
fields.description: Delta percentage relative to baseline; derived from CI coverage artifacts if available.

fields.name: Artifact Produced
fields.description: Whether CI produced required artifacts for this work item.

fields.name: Release Train
fields.description: Release cadence bucket used for executive reporting.

fields.name: Release Blocker
fields.description: Whether this item blocks the active train.

fields.name: Rollback Required
fields.description: Whether rollout requires rollback plan.

fields.name: Kill-Switch Available
fields.description: Whether kill-switch exists for feature/behavior.

fields.name: Primary Agent
fields.description: Primary executor (agent or human).

fields.name: Secondary Agents
fields.description: Additional agents participating.

fields.name: Agent Prompt ID
fields.description: Prompt identifier (hash/slug) used to execute.

fields.name: Prompt Version
fields.description: Prompt spec version.

fields.name: Agent Output Determinism
fields.description: Determinism classification for generated artifacts.

fields.name: Max Fix Scope
fields.description: Safety valve limit for automation changes.

fields.name: Human Approval Required
fields.description: Hard stop requiring human approval.

fields.name: Dry-Run Supported
fields.description: Whether automation supports dry-run mode for this item.

fields.name: Auto-Merge Allowed
fields.description: Whether PRs from automation may auto-merge.

fields.name: Strategic Theme
fields.description: Executive alignment category.

fields.name: Customer Impact
fields.description: Externality of the work.

fields.name: Revenue Sensitivity
fields.description: Revenue linkage strength.

fields.name: Reputation Risk
fields.description: Brand and trust risk.

fields.name: Impact Score
fields.description: 1-10; may be set by PM; used in WSJF.

fields.name: Effort Score
fields.description: 1-10; may be set by engineering; used in WSJF.

fields.name: Risk Score
fields.description: 1-10; may be set by security/release; used in WSJF.

fields.name: WSJF Score
fields.description: Derived; manual edits forbidden.

fields.name: Outcome Classification
fields.description: Post-completion outcome.

fields.name: Root Cause Category
fields.description: For failures/partials; feeds learning loops.

fields.name: Automation ROI
fields.description: Post-completion assessment.

fields.name: Reusable Artifact
fields.description: Whether output is reusable pattern/runbook/module.

fields.name: Runbook Created
fields.description: Whether a runbook exists/was created.

fields.name: ADR Required
fields.description: Whether an ADR is required under policy.

fields.name: ADR Linked
fields.description: Link or identifier for ADR if present.

fields.name: Pattern Extracted
fields.description: Whether a reusable pattern was extracted.

computed.name: True Priority
computed.description: Derived priority score combining WSJF, risk, and release blocker signals.

computed.name: GA Readiness Score
computed.description: Derived gate health and evidence completeness.

computed.name: Automation Safety Score
computed.description: Derived from Max Fix Scope, approval flags, determinism risk.

computed.name: Expected Cycle Time (Days)
computed.description: Derived from historical cycle times by class/gate.

constraints.name: No manual edits to computed fields
Evidence Required implies Governance Gate
constraints.rule: if Evidence Required == Yes then Governance Gate != None

constraints.name: GA Gate requires Evidence
constraints.rule: if Governance Gate == GA then Evidence Required == Yes
